body_content.explanation: the act of trying to make someone do something by arguing, persuading, etc. when this is opposite to what someone else is trying to make them do :
examples: The political pressures and counterpressures proved too much for him.
The move has provoked fierce lobbying and counter-pressure in the corridors of the UN.

body_content.explanation: physical pressure against something that is pushing in the opposite direction:
examples: It is wise to apply counter-pressure to the tap while using the spanner.
